needTips: Need some tips on hou tae begin? Here's a straucht-forrit guide!
webStep1Text:
Habitica isna onything wioot real-warld goals, sae pit in a few tasks. Ye can add mair later on as ye think o thaim! Aw tasks can be added in bi clickin on the green "Creaut" button.
* **Set up [Tae-Daes](http://habitica.wikia.com/wiki/To-Dos):** Pit in tasks ye dae ance or rarely in the Tae-Daes column, ane at a time. Ye can click on the tasks tae eedit thaim an add in chacklists, due dates, an mair!
* **Set up [Dailies](http://habitica.wikia.com/wiki/Dailies):** Pit in acteevities ye're needin'ae dae ivery day or on a parteecular day o the week, month, or year in the Dailies column. Click task tae eedit whan it will be due an/or set a stairt date. Ye can mak it due on a repeatin basis an aw, for example, every 3 days.
* **Set up [Habits](http://habitica.wikia.com/wiki/Habits):** Pit in habits ye're wantin'ae estaiblish in the Habits column. Ye can eedit the Habit tae chynge it tae juist a guid habit :heavy_plus_sign: or a bad habit :heavy_minus_sign:
* **Set up [Rewairds](http://habitica.wikia.com/wiki/Rewards):** As weel as the in-gemme Rewairds offered, add in acteevities or treats ye're wantin'ae uise as a motivation tae the Rewairds column. It's important tae gie yerself a break or allou some indulgence in moderation!
* Gin ye're needin inspiration for whit tasks tae add in, ye can leuk at the wiki's pages on [Saumple Habits](http://habitica.wikia.com/wiki/Sample_Habits), [Saumple Dailies](http://habitica.wikia.com/wiki/Sample_Dailies), [Saumple Tae-Daes](http://habitica.wikia.com/wiki/Sample_To-Dos), and [Saumple Rewairds](http://habitica.wikia.com/wiki/Sample_Custom_Rewards).
step2: Step 2: Gain Pynts bi Daein Things in Real Life
webStep2Text: Nou, stairt tecklin yer goals frae the list! As ye feenish tasks an chack thaim aff in Habitica, ye will gain [Experience](http://habitica.wikia.com/wiki/Experience_Points), whit helps ye level up, an [Gowd](http://habitica.wikia.com/wiki/Gold_Points), whit allous ye tae buy Rewards. Gin ye faw intae bad habits or miss yer Dailies, ye will losa [Halth](http://habitica.wikia.com/wiki/Health_Points). In that wey, the Habitica Experience an Halth baurs ser as a fun indicator o yer progress taewart yer goals. Ye'll stairt seein yer real life impruive as yer character advances in the gemme.
webStep3Text:
Once you're familiar with the basics, you can get even more out of Habitica with these nifty features:
 * Organize your tasks with [tags](http://habitica.wikia.com/wiki/Tags) (edit a task to add them).
 * Customize your [avatar](http://habitica.wikia.com/wiki/Avatar) by clicking the user icon in the upper-right corner.
 * Buy your [Equipment](http://habitica.wikia.com/wiki/Equipment) under Rewards or from the [Shops](<%= shopUrl %>), and change it under [Inventory > Equipment](<%= equipUrl %>).
 * Connect with other users via the [Tavern](http://habitica.wikia.com/wiki/Tavern).
 * Starting at Level 3, hatch [Pets](http://habitica.wikia.com/wiki/Pets) by collecting [eggs](http://habitica.wikia.com/wiki/Eggs) and [hatching potions](http://habitica.wikia.com/wiki/Hatching_Potions). [Feed](http://habitica.wikia.com/wiki/Food) them to create [Mounts](http://habitica.wikia.com/wiki/Mounts).
 * At level 10: Choose a particular [class](http://habitica.wikia.com/wiki/Class_System) and then use class-specific [skills](http://habitica.wikia.com/wiki/Skills) (levels 11 to 14).
 * Form a party with your friends (by clicking [Party](<%= partyUrl %>) in the navigation bar) to stay accountable and earn a Quest scroll.
 * Defeat monsters and collect objects on [quests](http://habitica.wikia.com/wiki/Quests) (you will be given a quest at level 15).
overviewQuestions:
Have questions? Check out the [FAQ](<%= faqUrl %>)! If your question isn't mentioned there, you can ask for further help in the [Habitica Help guild](<%= helpGuildUrl %>).

Good luck with your tasks!
